DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of the study is to assess the effects of MK0524A in reducing cholesterol levels in an Asian population.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of MK0524A on Cholesterol Levels (0524A-048)
DOC.criteria: Patient is male or female between 18 and 70 years of age Females of reproductive potential must agree to take acceptable contraceptive precautions for the duration of the study Patient has a history of not being able to take niacin or niacincontaining products Patient consumes more than 2 alcoholic beverages per day Patient has poorly controlled Type 1 or Type 2 diabetes mellitus Patient engages in vigorous exercise or an aggressive diet regimen
